name: get-accountHolders-id-balanceAccounts
description:
Returns a paginated list of the balance accounts associated with an account holder. To fetch multiple pages, use the query parameters. 

For example, to limit the page to 5 balance accounts and skip the first 10, use `/accountHolders/{id}/balanceAccounts?limit=5&offset=10`.

id.description: The unique identifier of the account holder.

offset.description: The number of items that you want to skip.

limit.description: The number of items returned per page, maximum 100 items. By default, the response returns 10 items per page.

$ul: **balanceAccounts**: List of balance accounts.
**hasNext**: Indicates whether there are more items on the next page.
**hasPrevious**: Indicates whether there are more items on the previous page.
